answer:
Contact your local health unit to book an immunization appointment for your son to receive his second dose of measles, mumps, rubella (MMR) vaccine and varicella (chickenpox) vaccine. Use the health unit finder. Bring your son's immunization records to the appointment.
Immunization Nurse
question: We moved from Alberta to BC since 2010 and my son currently 11 yrs old. According to his record, he only received MMR and Varicella 1 time and I would like to book appointment.
question_variation_0: what varicella is my son's only treatment
question_variation_1: what varicella do my son only get
question_variation_2: can varicella be booked in for varicella
